## Linear then platau

```{r}
dat1 |>
  ggplot(aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_abline()
```


```{r}
cor.test(~ x + y, data = dat1, method = "pearson")
```


```{r}
cor.test(~ x + y, data = dat1, method = "kendall")
```
